review.title: “Professional standards. Still growing”
review.pros: Pros – Growing into good trainings and standards.
review.cons: Cons – Too corporate. Has negative impact with community due to attitude from some.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “It is a job when you need to pay bills”
review.pros: Pros – Fellow employees are helpful, reliable, and are sometimes the best part of the job.
review.cons: Cons – Regulations constantly changing. Lack of discipline. Not enough hours.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Respect and communication should not just be empty words.
